author: Yzak Joule
comment: Overall, I like it.  There's only one thing I would really change about it.  I have no use for the "week" portion of the display, and it would be helpful if this face had a battery percentage of your phone displayed.  It would be perfect if I had the option to display phone battery percentage in the spot that "week" currently uses.  That would earn a 5 star from me.

author: TR Temple
comment: My favorite!

author: Zack Zaini
comment: The best one

author: karen barclay
comment: Good looking watch face
title: Nice

author: Daniel Brito
comment: Not bad. I like

author: Team USA
comment: Better lasting battery. Very nice. Well worth the buck. Thanks n keep up the good work. After a few months of  testing. Lowering the brightness to 50% within your home  adds significant battery life from a depressing battery drainer other wise. Where's the windup or automatic standard these days. Why still a battery on these types of watches
title: A++ watch system updated

author: Marco Pena
comment: Switch phones and now I can't use this face. It won't appear on my phone or Android wear

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Please feel free to contact our email address.
We can give you a help for installation.
Thank you.

author: ASD
comment: Great app with a lot of options! Very pleased!
title: A41 for Moto 360 Great app!

author: Kevin Bond
comment: A very clean face, with all the inf ok that I would need to see at a glance.
title: Everything at once

author: Tommi Toivanen
comment: Best face from this developer, battery life is exelent compared to other faces from this developer. Nice design, good customisation options. One star more if dev add option to chance "Rosenburg" name logo to "Moto360". Thats the name of this watch, right? :)

author: Don Carter
comment: Perfect, has all the info I need, not too busy like some of the other faces.
title: A41 watchface

author: Montu Timbalia
comment: I like how the programmer still invest their time in still supporting their products. I am happy that the watch face is efficient and flexible
title: Love it

author: Chris Michetti
comment: Replace the year with the temperature and you have the best face ever

author: Tony Baez-Heredia
comment: Sweet!

author: hugo folba
comment: The watchface looks great but it really needs a color picker. That would give it the fifth start... Anyway, why not put it in the first place

reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
I've updated the app added LED color picker on it.
Would you please check.
Thanks.

title: Great, missing color

author: Byrion Smith
comment: Looks good, but needs the option to use small card previews, instead of the large ones which cover half the face.
title: Needs small card previews

author: Tom French
comment: Very smooth
title: Has all I want

author: young jsyn
comment: There are no permissions so it doesn't kill the battery like their other ones, I love the customizations too
title: Great watch face!

comment: Great watch face for the moto360. Especially like the B&W draw feature especially being able to change the W to multiple other colors. Rockin the red. If I was to change anything I would change the battery % to the phone's battery % instead of the watch. I would also like to see a custom color chooser for the B&W mode.
title: Awesomness.

author: David Cook
comment: Would love to see the battery level of the phone as well but this has been one if my favorites. Looks great on the low res display on the moto360
title: One of my favorites.

author: shrihara Palanetra
comment: Color changing option is only available for black and white mode, otherwise this is the best

reply.content:

I've updated the app added LED color picker on it.

title: Best among all

author: Victor Christopher Ong
comment: Awesome!

author: Kendon Marshall
comment: This has been my watch face for the last few weeks and I love it! Would be cool if you could offer other colors for the glow of the default face
title: My Favorite Watch Face

author: Travis Meiss
comment: Beautifully designed watch face. Easy to ready quickly, and easy on the 360's battery.
title: Great Face

author: Don C
comment: Getting better.  The only lag is the red letters come in a bit late, which is kind of weird. It will do for now.  Not cool when you want to show the watch face off though.
title: One of the best watch faces but,

author: Todd Risen
comment: Need more options

author: Jordan Gates
comment: This watch face is so awesome and would be a 5 star easily but unfortunately the glaring problem that so many others have noticed needs to be fixed. When you turn the watch up towards your face to see the time, the cool watch face does not display. Instead, a black and white version shows up for about 0.8 seconds. Then and only then does the cool watch face show up.  I want to show my associates what a cool device the Moto 360 is but after I show them they always say; "What's with the black and white image that shows up before the face comes up."  The developer asked another reviewer who complained about the same problem; "Thank you for your feedback. I'd like to improve. Let me confirm, how many seconds or longer is it stay at the dimmed mode? Thank you"  As if he or she was not aware of the issue. It is so glaring, Plus it is not dim, it is a bright as bright can be black and white "ghost" of the wonderful face.  I can't believe anyone could miss it. So I have to go back to another face so I can show off my Moto 360. I did not ask for a refund because the face is very cutting edge and I figured it would be fixed.
title: So close but glaring problem handicaps review

author: Bryan Sloan
comment: Battery life seems much better...   But the strange black and white mode needs to be optional or removed.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Today,I've done big update for the battery it's life can be extended.
Would you please check and install the latest version of the app.
Thank you.

author: Zach Blaker
comment: This is an awesome watchface! But there is one annoying thing. Every time I turn on the watch display, it shows the black and white dimmed mode before going full color.  I've tried restarting my watch and also re-selecting the watch face. Is there another setting I need to mess with?

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
I'd like to improve.Let me confirm ,how many seconds or longer is it stay at the dimmed mode?
Thank you.

title: Love it

author: Victor Miranda
comment: I disable ambient screen on my moto 360. So it just goes dark after a few minutes. When it comes back on still show the watchface as white as ambient light was on and the 2 second after it goes to the regular watchface. It is kind of annoying. Can you fix it. Same issues with your other A watchface a bought. This does not happen on build in moto watchfaces.Thanks
title: Beautiful Watchface

author: George Demeny
comment: Very nice watch face, but I wish the force draw menu had an option for always show full version. Every time my watch turns on, it first shows the black and white version for a second and then goes to full version. Very annoying,  costing a star in my opinion. Otherwise really great job.
title: Very nice on Moto 360

author: Rob Newhart
comment: I really like the interface, as well as being able to see the date as well as the power level of the watch.  I am having the same issue with the lag from the sleep mode to the watch showing the full interface.  I was able to make it less glaring by changing the wake filter to green, rather than the default black and white.  Hopefully the developers will update the app to remove the lag.
title: Cool Interface

author: Gregory Barraza Jr
comment: Mine is doing the same as the other ratings.  At first the face is white and black for a bit, then changes over to the fluorescent green.
title: One problem

author: Peter JUVAN
comment: I have also the problem of the white background when turning on the watch.(PLEASE FIX IT). For bellow one second it shows black and white screen than changes to default green. But that happened after i selected white and than gone back to default. Possibility to switch date and month for Europe residents.
title: Great great great.

author: Richard LaBennett
comment: Really love this face design. Techy, nerdy, and cool, but it drains my watch battery very quickly, much more than other watch faces. Seems like the black and white version stays on longer than others when the watch dims.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Today,I've done big update for the battery it's life can be extended.
Would you please check and install the latest version of the app.
Thank you.

title: Love this face design but drains battery!

author: Sheldon Botha
comment: Awesome faces but like others mine also loads in black and white mode each time the watch wakes, if this was fixed I'd give 5 stars
title: Nice faces but also have the black and white issue

author: Russell Roberts
comment: I really like this face but I hope it doesn't kill my watch battery.  Seems to be the trend without proper API.
title: Very Nice!

author: nathan driggers
comment: Same as everyone else.. White and black for 1 second or so before the actual screen I paid for shows up. Please fix.

author: Joey B
comment: Like the custom colors and amount of info. Wish it could also show me my next appointment.
title: Excellent value

author: scott davis
comment: I would buy a halloween theamed one in a second
title: great watch face
